trends: There has been one other sighting in Cap-d'Ail
There were no other sightings in Cap-d'Ail on or around June 13th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm living in south of France. I would like to report a UFOs sighting that i have captured using my cellphone (iphone5) camera. What amazed me after 3 shots that i took, is that I didn't notice the object at that time. It was a terrible weather that day of June 13, 2013. We are expecting a powerful thunderstorm that day so i took a photo of the clouds forming just above the yacht. Powerful lightning was experienced that day cutting electricity 4-5 times all over "-5 villages. It was not a plane nor a helicopter, it was totally different. I tried to zoom the image and did some color changing just to figure out exactly the shape of the object using an enhancement application in the iphone and i keep on having a dark shade beneath the object itself like a source of heat or something. Some could argue that it's a clouds forming shapes which i thought it was but clouds cannot do a triangular shapes. i do have a photo of clouds making a circular shapes but triangular shapes with almost perfect straight line that is a bit "impossible". I am sharing this genuine photo just to hope that someone out there may enlighten us to what exactly this objects And also kindly take a look also at the far right side of the photo. There is another object that is floating above and that shape is very similar to a UfO sigted around the world... Many thanks
Summary: Surprised, Amazed, Grateful on that day. Because now i can really accept that they do really exist.
